pMotor Class Reference
[Joints]

Describes a joint motor. Some joints can be motorized, this allows them to apply a force to cause attached actors to move. Joints which can be motorized: pJointPulley pJointRevolute is used for a similar purpose with pJointD6. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • float targetVelocity
  • float maximumForce
  • bool freeSpin

Detailed Description

Describes a joint motor. Some joints can be motorized, this allows them to apply a force to cause attached actors to move. Joints which can be motorized: pJointPulley pJointRevolute is used for a similar purpose with pJointD6.

Member Data Documentation

float pMotor::targetVelocity

The relative velocity the motor is trying to achieve.Default = 0.0f.

float pMotor::maximumForce

The maximum force (or torque) the motor can exert.Default = 0.0f.

bool pMotor::freeSpin

If true, motor will not brake when it spins faster than velTarget.Default = false.
